explains: n. 枕头套（等于 pillow slip）

sentences.en: I put my pillow into the pillowcase.
sentences.cn: 我把我的枕头放进枕套中。

sentences.en: I made a snake bag out of a pillowcase, as Helen had instructed.
sentences.cn: 我用枕套做了个蛇袋，就像海伦教我的那样。

sentences.en: The pillowcase openings must be facing each other in the middle of the bed.
sentences.cn: 两个枕套的开口处要面向床的中间。
